title: Border, 1800–30
description:
Wide central band of leaves alternating with a grouping of three convex staves. Every second leaf is inverted. There are black scrolls above and below these motifs. Bands of strung beads along top and bottom edges.


H#239

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1800–30.
1800–30. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-230.
